title: KYC Policy
paragraph1: The Company adheres to and complies with "Know your customer" principles, which aim to prevent financial crime and money laundering through client identification and due diligence.
paragraph2: The Company reserves the right, at any time, to ask for any KYC documentation it deems necessary to determine the identity and location of a user. We reserve the right to restrict the service, payment, or withdrawal until identity is sufficiently determined, or for any other reason in our sole discretion.
paragraph3: All customers must verify their email address to open an account. In order to deposit, all customers must provide their name, address, occupation and date of birth. If customer activity alerts any of our monitoring parameters, the customer must complete the activities required by our identity verification service. Documents that the identity verification service may require include, but are not limited to: government issued ID, selfies to be scanned by AI. We may require additional documentation for manual review, such as: proof of address, which includes but is not limited to, a utility bill; proof of funds, which includes but is not limited to, a bank statement or a paycheck.

notes.heading: Notes on the "KYC Process"
notes.note1: When the KYC process is unsuccessful, the reason is documented and escalated.
notes.note2: Once all proper documents are provided and deemed satisfactory, the account will be approved.
